static gaussian_logpdf(x, loc, scale)[source]

NOTE logpdf (for gaussian) = -0.5 * ((x-loc)^2/scale^2 + log(2π*scale^2)) Here omit the term log(2π*scale^2)

static poisson_logpmf(k, mu)[source]

NOTE logpmf (for poisson) = klogmu - mu - log(k!) Stirling’s approximation: ln(K!) ~ klogk - k + log(2πk) / 2 Here omit the term log(2πk) / 2
